biocontainers.name: pyvolve
biocontainers.summary: Pyvolve is an open-source Python module for simulating sequences along a phylogenetic tree according to continuous-time Markov models of sequence evolution. Please cite: Spielman, S.J., and Wilke, C.O. (2015). Pyvolve: A Flexible Python Module for Simulating Sequences along Phylogenies. PLOS ONE 10, e0139047.

biotools.summary: Open-source Python module for simulating sequences along a phylogenetic tree according to continuous-time Markov models of sequence evolution.

bioschemas.name: Pyvolve
bioschemas.summary: Open-source Python module for simulating sequences along a phylogenetic tree according to continuous-time Markov models of sequence evolution.
